title: What revolution is going to come after the Digital Revolution? - Quora

response.answer_text: One of them might be the Environmental Revolution. during which all the branches of knowledge and all the arts would pool their thoughts and activities synergically (or synergistically) to save the planet and its dwellers.Sometime during or after this revolution (but doubtfully before) there might be an Ethical Revolution.
The "Biotechnical" revolution.  We are the verge of understanding biology down to first principles.  Nothing will be the same once this happens.
